obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_31_0: Look, Susie! The&closest you'll ever&get to an "A"!/%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_48_0: Kris, I get why&you're getting in my&way! You're jealous,&aren't you!?/%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_49_0: Kris, you're tired&of being the class&No.3, gazing distantly&at Noelle and I's&fruited figures.../%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_50_0: So rather than ever&STUDYING, you'd enlist&SUSIE to take us down!/%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_51_0: Kris... you are truly&depraved. Playing&in the mud with&the class hellion./%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_52_0: But Kris, I am&a kind and brave&hero! If you come&to our side.../%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_80_0: I'll show you&"bumper cars" is a&game of INTELLECT,&not skill!/%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_89_0: Fools! This is&Smart Smoke! It means&my car is getting&stronger!/%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_82_0: You may be a&slightly less&distant No. 3!&Haha... slightly./%
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_158_0: * Berdly calls Queen for help!&* But Queen is pretending to be on the phone!
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_159_0: * Berdly asks Queen what snacks they have at home!&* Queen nods! She has earbuds in!
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_160_0: * Berdly gives the secret sign!&* But Queen is busy with a coloring book!
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_161_0: * Berdly summons Queen!&* Queen calls in sick!
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_162_0: * Berdly shows Queen his card collection!&* Queen escaped successfully.
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_167_0: * Berdly's coaster car thing looks sick.
obj_berdlyb_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_171_0: * Berdly asks Queen for healing!&* She says "You're Doing Great Honey"
